attributes.background: The CPC test should be removed for LGV/HGV Drivers whose have 10/15 years experience, i am retired but hold a LGV1 with forty yrs experience, if the CPC was removed i could return to work and come off benefits, but on a pension i can't afford to pay for the CPC.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Drop the DCPC 35 hrs training for experienced HGV/LGV (C+E) Class 1 Drivers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593067

Scrap Drivers Certificate Professional Competence (DCPC) to ease driver shortage: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591225
